Detailed Description

template<class TYPE>
class ApproachFunctor< TYPE >

This class implements an example functor.

It must implement operator() as shown. The operator should return the value of the function to be integrated. This is probably not a good example because it integrates y' = -cy (where c is the approach rate). The exact solution to this is y = e^(-ct).
